SourceProxy.label: Geo JSON Reader
SourceProxy.name: geojsonreader

Documentation.long_help: Reads geojson data files into polydata dataset.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The Geo JSON Reader reads geojson data files. The expected file extension is .geojson. The output of this reader is a vtkPolyData

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the geojson reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: StringInput
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: String used as data input (instead of file) when StringInputMode is enabled

IntVectorProperty.name: StringInputMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get whether to use StringInput instead of reading input from file. The default is off

IntVectorProperty.name: TriangulatePolygons
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get whether to convert all output polygons to triangles. Note that if OutinePolygons mode is on, then no output polygons are generated, and in that case, this option is not relevant. The default is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutlinePolygons
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get option to generate the border outlining each polygon, so that the output cells for polygons are vtkPolyLine instances. The default is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSerializedPropertiesArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get option to generate the border outlining each polygon, so that the output cells for polygons are vtkPolyLine instances. The default is off.

StringVectorProperty.name: SerializedPropertiesArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get name of data array for serialized GeoJSON "properties" node. If specified, data will be stored as vtkCellData/vtkStringArray.

StringVectorProperty.name: FeatureNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/get name of data array for serialized GeoJSON "properties" node. If specified, data will be stored as vtkCellData/vtkStringArray.
